item.title: Research on System of Access and Benefit Sharing of Traditional Knowledge Related to Genetic Resources
item.description:
Abstract

The paper examines Chinaâ€™s legal and policy frameworks for the access and benefit sharing (ABS) of traditional knowledge associated with genetic resources. It evaluates current legislation, identifies challenges, and proposes improvements to ensure fairness and biodiversity conservation in compliance with international agreements.

Citation

Xue, B.-P., & Xue, F. (2022). Research on System of Access and Benefit Sharing of Traditional Knowledge Related to Genetic Resources. Journal of MUC (Natural Sciences Edition).
